author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Implement locking functionality - does not handle locks on deleted
files yet (but does pass tests on all other lock tests).
(added): New file to handle get_locks RA function.
(added): New file to handle core locking RA functions.
(svn_ra_serf__merge_context_t): Add lock_tokens hash and keep_locks flag.
(setup_merge_headers): New helper to set RELEASE_LOCKS header if needed.
(create_lock_token_list): Helper to tell MERGE what locks we hold.
(create_merge_body): Call create_lock_token_list to add in locks to the body.
(svn_ra_serf__merge_create_req): Add lock_tokens hash and keep_locks flag;
tell our handler to call setup_merge_headers.
(simple_request_context_t, handle_status_only): Move to util.c and rename.
(proppatch_context_t): Move to after commit_context_t so we can refer to it.
(return_response_err): Take in handler as well as req context and produce
an error that more closely aligns with ra_dav's error string.
(checkout_dir, checkout_file): Pass new args to return_response_err.
(setup_proppatch_headers): New func to send along If headers.
(proppatch_resource): Call proppatch_headers and adjust for rename; handle
(setup_put_headers): Adjust whitespace; add in If headers if needed.
(open_root): Adjust for renames; give proppatch our commit.
close_file, abort_edit): Adjust for renames and new args;
(close_edit): Give merge our lock_tokens hash and keep_locks flag.
(report_info_t): Add lock_token string if this entry is locked.
(report_context_t): Store lock hashes seen during editor driving.
(check_lock): First cut at a helper to see if we now have a lock to work
around a bug in current versions of mod_dav_svn (which will be fixed
(end_report): For an open-file with changes, see if there's a lock on it.
(set_path, link_path): Store our locks that we say for later use.
(svn_ra_serf__handle_status_only): Move from commit.c and note reason.
(svn_ra_serf__merge_create_req): Add lock_tokens hash and keep_locks flag

author: maxb
msg: Argh! propchange-email.pl contains massive duplication of code from
commit-email.pl. Modify both files to minimize disparity between the shared

author: pburba
msg: Rev svn_utf_cstring_*_utf8_ex so xlate_handle_node_t structs are
cached based on the conversion taking place rather than a string
Change all callers of svn_utf_cstring_*_utf8_ex to use

author: ivan
msg: Remove svn_wc_text_modified_p2 from public API, because we use it only
This partially reverts r17339, with the permission of the original
Signature and docstring copied from svn_wc_text_modified_p2.
